**矮人铁头盔**（dwarvish iron helm）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[头盔](/wiki/%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "头盔")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**安全帽**（hard hat）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.5 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [5.6 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[矮人](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矮人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定矮人铁头盔。矮人族的角色如果在游戏开始时会获得[钢盔](/wiki/%E9%92%A2%E7%9B%94 "钢盔")，则改为获得矮人铁头盔。不过，由于游戏中没有起始物品有钢盔的角色，所以该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

非[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")的[矮人](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矮人（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")怪物生成时有1⁄4的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一顶矮人铁头盔[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

矮人铁头盔的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为2。

## 策略

矮人铁头盔是游戏中唯一一种基础AC加成为2的头盔，只要你不是特别依赖[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")的角色，矮人铁头盔一般都是前中期最好用的头盔。不过，它也是最重的头盔。由于由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，它也会因[生锈陷阱](/index.php?title=%E7%94%9F%E9%94%88%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "生锈陷阱 (page does not exist)")或[锈怪](/index.php?title=%E9%94%88%E6%80%AA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "锈怪 (page does not exist)")而受损伤。要保持它的AC不下降，你需要给它做[防锈](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E9%94%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防锈 (page does not exist)")处理。

一般游戏进行到中期后，矮人铁头盔就会被替换成其他更实用的头盔，以凑齐[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")：[感知头盔](/wiki/%E6%84%9F%E7%9F%A5%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "感知头盔")和[卓越头盔](/wiki/%E5%8D%93%E8%B6%8A%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "卓越头盔")除了提供防御外还有其他实用的增益；[精灵皮帽](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%9A%AE%E5%B8%BD "精灵皮帽")可以安全附魔到+7，因此能提供最高的防御，而且不会阻碍施法，虽然不是硬质头盔，但此时落石的伤害也不会构成什么威胁。

## 历史

矮人铁头盔最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dwarvish_iron_helm/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems, a dwarvish iron helm is sometimes called a **dwarvish helm**, with iron as its base material - they may also have their material appended within the name, depending on the variant (e.g., "a +0 dwarvish [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") helm").

Some variants may give dwarves (including the player character) an AC bonus for wearing a dwarvish iron helm.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), dwarven [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") that start the game with a helmet will instead start with a +0 dwarvish iron helm, making use of the existing substitution.

A dwarvish iron helm can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") to a helm of telepathy or a helm of brilliance. Upgrading an [orcish helm](/wiki/Orcish_helm "Orcish helm"), helm of telepathy or helm of brilliance will produce a dwarvish iron helm.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the dwarvish iron helm grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including player dwarves.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), a dwarvish helm grants 1 AC and 1 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn, and has a built-in [lantern](/wiki/Lantern "Lantern") that can be turned on or off by [applying](/wiki/Apply "Apply") the helm. Dwarves that generate in dark levels within the [Gnomish Mines](/wiki/Gnomish_Mines "Gnomish Mines") will have their helm's lantern lit.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the dwarvish helm grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including player dwarves. Dwarven Knights start the game with a +0 dwarvish helm in place of the standard helmet.

[Croesus](/wiki/Croesus "Croesus") has a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a [golden](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") dwarvish helm.

A dwarvish helm can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [dwarvish short sword](/wiki/Dwarvish_short_sword "Dwarvish short sword") and a [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet"); a dwarvish helm can also be combined with a [large shield](/wiki/Large_shield "Large shield") to create a [dwarvish roundshield](/wiki/Dwarvish_roundshield "Dwarvish roundshield").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, dwarven [Paladins](/wiki/Paladin_\(role\) "Paladin (role)") start the game with a +0 dwarvish iron helm in place of the standard helmet.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the dwarvish iron helm grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including player dwarves. Dwarven [Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") that start the game with a helmet will instead start with a +0 dwarvish iron helm.

Upgrading an orcish helm will produce a dwarvish helm as in SLASH'EM, but upgrading a dwarvish helm will only produce an orcish helm. Forging recipes and other details are the same as in SLASH'EM and EvilHack.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 226](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L226)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 381](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L381)

矮人铁头盔（dwarvish iron helm）是NetHack中的一种头盔类防具。它由铁制成，未鉴定时外观为安全帽（hard hat）。

Contents

生成

矮人族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定矮人铁头盔。矮人族的角色如果在游戏开始时会获得钢盔，则改为获得矮人铁头盔。不过，由于游戏中没有起始物品有钢盔的角色，所以该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[1]。

非亡灵的矮人怪物生成时有1⁄4的概率获得一顶矮人铁头盔[2]。

描述

矮人铁头盔的基础AC加成为2。

策略

矮人铁头盔是游戏中唯一一种基础AC加成为2的头盔，只要你不是特别依赖施法的角色，矮人铁头盔一般都是前中期最好用的头盔。不过，它也是最重的头盔。由于由铁制成，它也会因生锈陷阱或锈怪而受损伤。要保持它的AC不下降，你需要给它做防锈处理。

一般游戏进行到中期后，矮人铁头盔就会被替换成其他更实用的头盔，以凑齐飞升套件：感知头盔和卓越头盔除了提供防御外还有其他实用的增益；精灵皮帽可以安全附魔到+7，因此能提供最高的防御，而且不会阻碍施法，虽然不是硬质头盔，但此时落石的伤害也不会构成什么威胁。

历史

矮人铁头盔最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

In variants with object materials systems, a dwarvish iron helm is sometimes called a dwarvish helm, with iron as its base material - they may also have their material appended within the name, depending on the variant (e.g., "a +0 dwarvish mithril helm").

Some variants may give dwarves (including the player character) an AC bonus for wearing a dwarvish iron helm.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dwarven Knights that start the game with a helmet will instead start with a +0 dwarvish iron helm, making use of the existing substitution.

A dwarvish iron helm can be upgraded to a helm of telepathy or a helm of brilliance. Upgrading an orcish helm, helm of telepathy or helm of brilliance will produce a dwarvish iron helm.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the dwarvish iron helm grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including player dwarves.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, a dwarvish helm grants 1 AC and 1 DR while worn, and has a built-in lantern that can be turned on or off by applying the helm. Dwarves that generate in dark levels within the Gnomish Mines will have their helm's lantern lit.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the dwarvish helm grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including player dwarves. Dwarven Knights start the game with a +0 dwarvish helm in place of the standard helmet.

Croesus has a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a golden dwarvish helm.

A dwarvish helm can be created at a forge by combining a dwarvish short sword and a helmet; a dwarvish helm can also be combined with a large shield to create a dwarvish roundshield.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, dwarven Paladins start the game with a +0 dwarvish iron helm in place of the standard helmet.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, the dwarvish iron helm grants +1 AC to dwarves that wear them, including player dwarves. Dwarven Undead Slayers that start the game with a helmet will instead start with a +0 dwarvish iron helm.

Upgrading an orcish helm will produce a dwarvish helm as in SLASH'EM, but upgrading a dwarvish helm will only produce an orcish helm. Forging recipes and other details are the same as in SLASH'EM and EvilHack.
